creator: ide
name: Java Theia (docker)
description: Che development + Theia in a sidecar container (docker)

recipe.content:
services:
 theia:
  image: eclipse/che-theia:nightly
  mem_limit: 1073741824
 dev-machine:
  image: eclipse/che-dev:nightly
  mem_limit: 2147483648
  depends_on:
    - theia

creator: ide
name: Java Theia (openshift)
description: Che development + Theia in a sidecar container (openshift)

recipe.content:
---
kind: List
items:
-
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
    name: ws
  spec:
    containers:
      -
        image: eclipse/che-theia:nightly
        name: theia
      -
        image: eclipse/che-dev:nightly
        name: dev

creator: ide
name: Java-MySQL CentOS
description: Multi-machine environment with Java CentOS Stack and MySQL database

recipe.content:
services:
 db:
  image: centos/mysql-57-centos7
  environment:
   MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: password
   MYSQL_DATABASE: petclinic
   MYSQL_USER: petclinic
   MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
  mem_limit: 1073741824
 dev-machine:
  image: eclipse/centos_jdk8
  mem_limit: 2147483648
  depends_on:
    - db

creator: ide
name: Java-MySQL
description: Multi-machine environment with Default Java Stack and MySQL database

recipe.content:
services:
 db:
  image: eclipse/mysql
  environment:
   MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: password
   MYSQL_DATABASE: petclinic
   MYSQL_USER: petclinic
   MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
  mem_limit: 1073741824
 dev-machine:
  image: eclipse/ubuntu_jdk8
  mem_limit: 2147483648
  depends_on:
    - db

commands.name: run php script
commands.commandLine: [ -z ${editor.current.file.path} ] && echo "Open a PHP file in the editor before executing this command." || php ${editor.current.file.path}

commands.name: debug php script
commands.commandLine: [ -z ${editor.current.file.path} ] && echo "Open a PHP file in the editor before executing this command." || QUERY_STRING="start_debug=1&debug_host=localhost&debug_port=10137" php ${editor.current.file.path}

creator: ide
name: Zend
description: Zend stack with PHP 7, Zend Server 9 and Z-Ray.

commands.name: run php script
commands.commandLine: [ -z ${editor.current.file.path} ] && echo "Open a PHP file in the editor before executing this command." || php ${editor.current.file.path}

commands.name: debug php script
commands.commandLine: [ -z ${editor.current.file.path} ] && echo "Open a PHP file in the editor before executing this command." || QUERY_STRING="start_debug=1&debug_host=localhost&debug_port=10137" php ${editor.current.file.path}

commands.name: restart zend server
commands.commandLine: sudo sqlite3 /usr/local/zend/var/db/zsd.db "UPDATE ZSD_DIRECTIVES SET DISK_VALUE='http://${server.port.10081}/ZendServer' WHERE NAME='zray.zendserver_ui_url'" && sudo sed -i 's#zray.zendserver_ui_url=.*#zray.zendserver_ui_url=http://${server.port.10081}/ZendServer#g' /usr/local/zend/etc/conf.d/zray.ini && sudo /usr/local/zend/bin/zendctl.sh restart

commands.name: show admin password
commands.commandLine: echo "Zend Server admin password is `sudo cat /root/zend-password`"

name: Openshift Default
description: Openshift Single Pod Workspace

recipe.content:
kind: List
items:
-
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
    name: app
  spec:
    containers:
      -
        image: rhche/centos_jdk8:latest
        name: main
        ports:
          -
            containerPort: 8080
            protocol: TCP

name: Openshift Sql
description: Openshift Multi Pod Workspace

recipe.content:
---
kind: List
items:
-
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
    name: web
  spec:
    containers:
      -
        image: rhche/centos_jdk8:latest
        name: main
        ports:
          -
            containerPort: 8080
            protocol: TCP
-
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
    name: db
    labels:
      type: db
  spec:
    containers:
      -
        image: centos/mysql-57-centos7
        name: main
        ports:
          -
            name: mysql
            containerPort: 3306
            protocol: TCP
        env:
          - 
            name: MYSQL_USER
            value: 'petclinic'
          - 
            name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
            value: 'password'
          - 
            name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
            value: 'password'
          - 
            name: MYSQL_DATABASE
            value: 'petclinic'

-
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
    name: db
  spec:
    selector:
      type: db
    ports:
      - name: mysql
        port: 3306
        protocol: TCP
        targetPort: mysql
